description:
A woman who works for the banking division of Teiwaz. On McMurdo`s orders, she takes charge of Tekkadan`s accounting.
2nd season:Dispatched from Teiwaz, she is responsible for accounting at Tekkadan`s Martian headquarters. She supports the boys of Tekkadan even though she is distressed by their way of life, which forces them to risk their lives.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Merribit Stapleton
